thread.section_title: Merchant Capital Source Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Merchant Capital Source | merchantcapitalsource.com
thread.title: Mark V
thread.title_full: Merchant Capital Source reviewed by Mark V

author: Mark V
title: Mark V
text: Merchant Capital is a great company. They provide amazing service and the process was simple and lightning fast. Service after the loan is also very good. I get a daily email of amount deducted off my loan. This was my 2nd loan and will definitely be using them in the future.
